basic_information.scholarship_name: Bannish-Byrne-Laverty Scholarship in Mathematics and Statistics
basic_information.committee_name: CMS - Mathematics and Statistics Scholarship Commi

description: The Bannish-Byrne-Laverty Scholarship awardee is a student who embodies qualities that Drs. Brittany Bannish, Sean Laverty, Jesse Byrne, and Mrs. Karen Byrne value. This student enlivens the department with their enthusiasm for mathematics, collegial spirit, hard work, and support of others. Eligibility Requirements Undergraduate Student Minimum of 2.5 GPA Must be a Mathematics and Statistics major Preference is given to a Junior or Senior Mathematics and Statistics student
